title: 2000 Harley Davidson Motorcycle
item_description:
2000 Harley-Davidson Motorcycle

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal on Thursday, October 23, or Friday October 24, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day, by APPOINTMENT ONLY. Earlier removal of this lot will not be permitted. 

General Specifications

  • Make: Harley Davidson
  • VIN: 1HD1BSY68YY075687
  • License: 15R6160
    • Expiration Date: 7/22/2010
    • PNO-REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • Key: Not Available

Brakes/Wheels/Tires

  • Front Tire: Mh90-21 Mc 54h
  • Rear Tire: 160/70r17 73v

Dimensions

  • Length: 91”
  • Height: 50”
  • Width: 29”
  • Ground Clearance: 7”

Probate Court Estate Note: This vehicle is behind sold on behalf of a probate estate. Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, and and Probate Court Documents will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
